directions: Combine onions, currants, vinegar, and ginger in medium bowl. Cut peaches into 1/3-inch cubes. Add to onion mixture and toss to coat. Cover; chill at least 1 hour and up to 6 hours, tossing occasionally.
ingredients: 1 3/4 pounds peaches (about 4 medium), peeled, halved, pitted
title: Peach Chutney
